mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE1) VALUES(#{member_id},#{member_name},#{member_gender},#{member_email}, #{member_phone1})
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_GRADE, MEMBER_POINT, MEMBER_PHONE1 , MEMBER_REG FROM MEMBER
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_ID = #{member_id}, MEMBER_NAME = #{member_name}, MEMBER_GENDER = #{member_gender}, MEMBER_EMAIL = #{member_email}, MEMBER_PHONE1 = #{member_phone1} WHERE MEMBER_ID = ${member_id}
